Headline: Remote Fitness Coach & Health Strategist | Educator at INFS | 10+ Years Experience | Creator of the Exercise Execution Mastery Workshop | Mentoring Clients & Coaches in Evidence-Based Training/Nutrition
Comment:
Absolutely true :) Brain fog is real.

Here's my beating the brain fog ritual:
1. Keep the phone away and close your eyes for 5-10 minutes irrespective whether on chair or bed. 
2. Then wake up and look far way outside the window for 3 to 4 minutes. Walk in the sun if possible.
3. Get back to work station and listen to instrumental music that's not too loud.
